    void generateMap​(int x, int y, java.util.Map<java.awt.Point,​StaticEntity> movementMap)
    Generate a Map usable by the Game of size (x, y) It will first generate the left side of a Tetris like grid with a fixed tile representing the Ghost's starting position __________________ | |___ | | | | __| |_____| | |__| |__| |_____| | __| __| | <- Ghost |__| |__| |_____| <- starting | |_____|________| | |___ |___ |__| |_____|_____|_____| The grid is mirrored to generate a symmetric map and the shapes are scaled by 2 to avoid 0 thickness Paths and Walls The edges are then converted to Paths and the inside of the Shapes to Walls This generate a set of path with no dead ends
    private java.util.ArrayList<Movement> legalMoves​(java.awt.Point pos)
    Return a list of possible moves from a position on the Shape Grid
    private void scaleShapes()
    Scale the Shape map by 2 to simplify the conversion into a usable map
    private int shapeFill()
    Generate list of Tetris like shapes filling a (X/2; Y) grid

    Generate the symmetric of the current Shape list

  • Method Details

    • generateMap

      public void generateMap​(int x, int y, java.util.Map<java.awt.Point,​StaticEntity> movementMap)
       Generate a Map usable by the Game of size (x, y)
 It will first generate the left side of a Tetris like grid with a fixed tile representing the Ghost's starting position
 __________________
 |  |___  |     |  |
 |   __|  |_____|  |
 |__|  |__|  |_____|
 |   __|   __|     | <- Ghost
 |__|  |__|  |_____| <- starting
 |  |_____|________|
 |  |___  |___  |__|
 |_____|_____|_____|
 The grid is mirrored to generate a symmetric map and the shapes are scaled by 2 to avoid 0 thickness Paths and Walls
 The edges are then converted to Paths and the inside of the Shapes to Walls
 This generate a set of path with no dead ends
      Parameters:
      x - width of the map
      y - height of the map
      movementMap - Map to populate

    • shapeFill

      private int shapeFill()
      Generate list of Tetris like shapes filling a (X/2; Y) grid
      Returns:
      the number a Shape generated

      Returns:

      Returns:
      list of possible moves

    • symmetric

      private void symmetric​(int startId)
      Generate the symmetric of the current Shape list
      Parameters:

      Parameters:
